description:
Add profiling to identify slow tests and suggest optimizations like parallelization, better fixtures, or test splitting strategies.

**Rationale:** Slow test suites delay feedback loops. Optimizing test execution directly improves developer productivity and CI costs.
title: Test Execution Profiler
